WorkItem.Description:
As i see, items with bonus armor have again bigger ratings than those with stats.So there are major differencies between beta Rawr and the latest release 2.1.9.
I think there is an issue with formulas(using the one before patch).

Comments.Message: No, Armor has just gone up in relative value. If you can see a problem with the formulae, let us know.

I  noticed that as well. For example the glove reinforcements are now top of the list, and same for the armor to cloak chant.

maybe a second look at the armor multiplier calcs is in order?

cheers

no way to edit my comment that I see

EDIT: I will take a second look at the armor calcs for item enhancements, if I can find it... I'm a newby to coding :P
Well, please do double check the calculations. That said, it's expected that armor went up in value, due to Savage Defense. The more armor we have, the larger % difference that Savage Defense makes.
